thread.title: Ivan marte
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Ivan marte

author: Ivan marte
title: Ivan marte
text: In my original conversation with a representative I was given all the details with price, features and benefits and once I made my order I found out that at the scheduled date to replace my four tires the order was wrong although my car information was registered than the new order was done for the next day and the total price was increased $ 50.00 due to the rear tires balacing which I believed was considered in the initial conversation.
